participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing with a love for animals. Open-minded and enjoys building connections with others.
participant_1.background: my father was a door to door salesman. i've three dogs. i am in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Creative and enthusiastic with a passion for storytelling and an appreciation for the arts. Enjoys sharing knowledge and experiences.
participant_2.background: i'm a huge star wars fan. i try various coffees as a hobby. i enjoy poetry. i played football for a division a college.
